thread.section_title: Leibish & Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Leibish & Co. | leibish.com
thread.title: Holley Lacey
thread.title_full: Leibish & Co. reviewed by Holley Lacey

author: Holley Lacey
title: Holley Lacey
text:
Itzik was professional, trustworthy, courteous, and extremely helpful. He expertly guided us through the custom ring design process from start to finish. We had very high expectations which were exceeded at each step along the way. He asked the right questions and clearly communicated our options. His patience, prompt responses, and his genuine concern were greatly appreciated. The resulting family heirloom custom ring was amazingly beautiful and absolutely PERFECT Leibish nailed it and hit a Grand Slam Home Run
Leibish & Co. sets the standard for exceptional quality and true value. We recommend them highly without hesitation and look forward using them in the future.
